STANDARD ROOM

We pay special attention to the decor in order to give each room a unique character and an exceptional atmosphere that guarantees peace and relaxation. Perfect for a short romantic stay or business trip.

₹3000/-

SUPERIOR ROOM

A cozy room with a sophisticated and personalized decor, decorated with beautiful fabrics created by the most prestigious designers (Pierre Frey, Manuel Canovas), high-end furniture and paintings, providing a warm, elegant and comfortable setting.

₹5000/-

EXECUTIVE ROOM

The room offers a lovely, discreet and luxurious atmosphere for your stays in Paris. With its classic setting, guests will be seduced by the room's pleasant decor and enjoy the cozy intimate setting.

₹6000/-

JUNIOR SUITE ROOM

Spacious rooms with a cozy living room with Nespresso machine (for some), dressing room, separate toilet, a bathroom with shower and bath. The lounge area can be easily separated from the bedroom by a sliding partition, allowing to enjoy a place of life in the room.

₹8000/-

Post by Bishal kumar mahapatra Bishal kumar mahapatra Created Oct 20Oct 20 Hotel Registration -------------------------------- Document function lord(){ document.getElementById("section").style.display="none"; } function booking(){ document.getElementById("section").style.display="block"; document.getElementById("header").style.display="none"; } function Register(){ document.getElementById("lblname").innerHTML=document.getElementById("txtname").value; document.getElementById("lbldate").innerHTML=document.getElementById("txtdate").value; document.getElementById("lbldays").innerHTML =document.getElementById("txtdays").value; document.getElementById("lblpersons").innerHTML =document.getElementById("txtpersons").value; var roomname = ""; var roomCost = 0; var facility = ""; var fCost = 0; var days = 0; var person = 0; var adv = 0; var ExtraPerson =0; dRadio = document.getElementById("txtdroom"); sRadio = document.getElementById("txtsroom"); if(dRadio.checked) { roomname = dRadio.value; roomCost = 2500; } if(sRadio.checked) { roomname = sRadio.value; roomCost = 4000; } acCheckbox = document.getElementById("txtAc"); lockerCheckBox = document.getElementById("txtLocker"); if(acCheckbox.checked){ facility += acCheckbox.value + "
"; fCost = 1000; roomCost = roomCost + fCost; } if(lockerCheckBox.checked) { facility += lockerCheckBox.value + "
"; fCost = 300; roomCost = roomCost + fCost; } document.getElementById("roomtype").innerHTML = roomname; document.getElementById("facility").innerHTML = facility; days= document.getElementById("txtdays").value; person= document.getElementById("txtpersons").value; if(days==1 && person<=2){ roomCost+=0; } else if(days==1 && person>2){ ExtraPerson=person-2; roomCost = roomCost + (ExtraPerso*1000); } else if(days>1 && person>2){ ExtraPerson=person-2; roomCost = (roomCost*days) + (ExtraPerson*1000); } document.getElementById("lbldays").innerHTML = days; document.getElementById("lblpersons").innerHTML = person; adv= document.getElementById("txtadvance").value; restCost = roomCost - adv; document.getElementById("lblA").innerHTML = adv; document.getElementById("lblB").innerHTML ="₹" + restCost; }

Document https://bishal008.github.io/Hotelform/ Post by Rajesh swain Rajesh swain Created Oct 20Oct 20 HOTEL REGISTRATION:- -------------------------------------- Document function load(){ document.getElementById("regdForm").style.display="none"; } function hide(){ document.getElementById("regdForm").style.display="block"; document.getElementById("frontPage").style.display="none"; } function get(){ document.getElementById("lblName").innerHTML=document.getElementById("txtName").value; document.getElementById("lblDate").innerHTML=document.getElementById("txtDate").value; document.getElementById("lblDays").innerHTML=document.getElementById("txtDays").value; document.getElementById("lblPerson").innerHTML=document.getElementById("txtPerson").value; document.getElementById("lblAdvance").innerHTML= document.getElementById("txtAdvance").value; var roomName=""; var roomCost=0; var amenities=""; var amenitiesCost=0; var extra=0; var advance=0; deluxeRoom=document.getElementById("deluxeRoom"); suiteRoom=document.getElementById("suiteRoom"); if(deluxeRoom.checked){ roomName=deluxeRoom.value; roomCost=2500; } if(suiteRoom.checked){ roomName=suiteRoom.value; roomCost=4000; } var ac=document.getElementById("Ac"); var Locker=document.getElementById("Locker"); if(ac.checked){ amenities +=ac.value +"
"; amenitiesCost=1000; roomCost =roomCost+amenitiesCost; } if(Locker.checked){ amenities +=Locker.value; amenitiesCost=300; roomCost =roomCost+amenitiesCost; } var days=document.getElementById("txtDays").value; var persons=document.getElementById("txtPerson").value; if(days==1&&persons<=2){ roomCost=0; }else if(days==1&&persons>2){ extra=persons-2; roomCost=roomCost+(extra*1000); }else if(days>1&&persons>2){ extra=persons-2; roomCost=(days*roomCost)+(extra*1000); } var advance=document.getElementById("txtAdvance").value; var total=roomCost-advance; document.getElementById("lblRoom").innerHTML=roomName; document.getElementById("lblAmenities").innerHTML=amenities; document.getElementById("lblTotal").innerHTML=`₹${total}`; } function exit(){ document.getElementById("regdForm").style.display="none"; document.getElementById("frontPage").style.display="block"; }
